title: PM wishes ‘happy Holi’ to Hindu community
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 18 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Friday felicitated the Hindu community on their festive occasion of Holi.
“Wishing all our Hindu community a very happy Holi, the festival of colours,” he said in a tweet.
The Hindu community in the country is celebrating Holi will full fervour.
The Constitution of Pakistan grants equal rights to minorities to practice their religion.
